attributes.action: Continue the vaccination of the whole of the Uk without pausing
attributes.additional_details:
To continue full and speedy vaccination program that has been rolling out. No 1 persons life is less important than anothers.
Bare in mind we are an island and attached to no other countries. So to vaccinate the whole of the Uk makes sense.
attributes.background: The Government proposes slowing or pausing vaccinations across the Uk in line with the who to allow a game of catch up

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign the following petition:

Stop pharmaceutical companies exporting UK made vaccines until UK contracts met
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572610
